reason: Bitcoin's failed rally attempt and pullback to $90,000, combined with significant regulatory uncertainty surrounding upcoming U.S. market structure bills and their potential impact on DeFi, suggest an immediate period of selling pressure and market indecision. While long-term adoption and bullish price targets remain, short-term risks are elevated due to regulatory overhang and technical weakness.
headlines: Hundreds of wealthy investors are using crypto to buy real estate in Europe
Asset manager VanEck explains how one bitcoin could be worth $2.9 million by 2050
Senate Republicans race toward crypto vote on bill with uncertain Democratic buy-in
Bitcoin pulls back to $90,000 as early Friday rally attempt fails
Crypto crowd could still walk away from U.S. market structure bill if DeFi needs unmet
